channel.title: (Apache Storm and Apache Spark Streaming)
channel.description: Comparison of Apache Storm and Apache Spark Streaming

div.p: This is the last post in the series on real-time systems. In the first post we discussed Apache Storm and Apache Kafka. In the second post we discussed Apache Spark (Streaming). In both posts we examined a small Twitter Sentiment Analysis program. Today, we will be reviewing both systems: how they compare and how they contrast.

channel.p: The intention is not to cast judgment over one project or the other, but rather to exposit the differences and similarities. Any judgments made, subtle or not, are mistakes in exposition and/or organization and are not actual endorsements of either project.
